snippet: Netflix faces fierce competition from streaming rivals like Amazon, Hulu and HBO, which are significantly increasing their investments.
abstract: Netflix reports third-quarter profit of $29.4 million, down 50 percent from $59.3 million in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 23 percent to $1.74 billion; total paid streaming members rose to 66.02 miliion, up from 50.65 million in year-ago quarter. growth that falls short of analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: Netflix faces fierce competition from streaming rivals like Amazon, Hulu and HBO, which are significantly increasing their investments.

headline.main: Netflix Profits Slide 50% as Streaming Growth Lags
headline.print_headline: Netflix Blames Competition and Churn for Missed Targets and Dive in Profits
